title: Silukku Marame Lyrics Paayum Puli Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers : Divya Kumar , Shashaa tirupati
Lyrics : Vairamuthu
Music : D Imman

Siluku marame Siluku marame
Silendru pooka va va va
Seeni pazhame Seeni pazhame
Sevvaayil sera va va va

Thottu thottu bayam vittu pochu
Thotta idam kulir vittu pochu
Aasaigalum thulir vittu pochu
Aadaigalum vazhi vittu pochu
Kalyana pechu kai koodi pochu
Aanandham pai poda angange
vaayada va va va
Nee va va va va va va va

Siluku marame Siluku marame
Silendru pooka va va va

Baby it is always true
People said i love you
Life is never a film I say
It feels filthy and strange
You are the one for me believe
You are the one for me just feel
Lets fly into a world so divine

Enna yellaram edhuka valloori thooka
yevvaru meetu eduppa
Unna rendaaga madithu kaiyoda eduthu
paiyoda maraithukuven

Naan vaigai aathu vellathoda ponaa
Nee enna seidhu ennai meetpaai mannaa
Naa neerkozhi pola neendhuven
Unna nenjoda serndhu yendhuven
Ada yen aasai penne
Yen jaadai kanne
Ambaari saanjaalum en
ponmanam sayadhey va va va

Siluku marame Siluku marame
Silendru pooka vaaa

Ennai Kathaazhang kaatil sithaanai maricha
Appodhu enna pannuva
Unna Senkutha thooki sengrundril aeri
Sithaanai kezha thalluven.

Oru singam ennai kavvi kondu ponaa
Nee enna senju ennai meetpaai veeraa.
Naa paayum puliyai maaruven
Andha paadhaalam variyil seeruven
Adi yen manja kiliye
Manjathil serpen
Vervaikul neeradi porvaikul poraada va

Siluku marame Siluku marame
Silendru pooka va va va
Seeni pazhame Seeni pazhame
Sevvaayil sera va va va

Thottu thottu bayam vittu pochu
Thotta idam kulir vittu pochu
Aasaigalum thulir vittu pochu
Aadaigalum vazhi vittu pochu
Kalyana pecha kai koodi pochu

angange vaayada va va va
